biotools.summary: The Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Registry (UGICR) is a clinical quality registry, that collects information about the diagnosis, treatment and outcomes of individuals with upper gastrointestinal cancer. The registry is managed by the Cancer Research Program part of Public Health and Preventive Medicine , Monash University.
